name: Createappx
tagline: CreateAppX will generate valid appx for windows 8.1 Universal Projects. It also allows to update manifest for projects.
body:
### About CreateAppX
CreateAppx is a tool created to update, build and deploy Windows 8.1 universal project. It allows users to manually update manifest file and build project without use of visual studio. It also validates build folder and generates final `.appx` file can be directly uploaded to windows store. This tool is created specially for 'Appzillon' users.

### Requirements
You will need `Windows 8.1 SDK`.
Build folder of Windows 8.1 generated by `Appzillon 3.1 IDE`.

### Explore
You can find more projects of `Sunny Singh` (@sunnsinghdev). You can explore more on technologies by [sunnysinghdev](https://www.sunnysinghdev.com).

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with Pages? Please shoot an email [contact support](mailto:sunnysinghdevcom@gmail.com?subject=CreateAppx Support&body=Hi Sunnysinghdevcom, ) and weâ€™ll help you sort it out.
